medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Dysphagia and choledocholithiasis have been present following a year of atypical chest pain, which had a negative cardiac workup.
medical_history.past_medical_history: End-Stage Renal Disease (ESRD) due to thrombotic microangiopathy, systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), antiphospholipid antibody syndrome, history of DVT, obstructive sleep apnea (OSA), seizure disorder, bipolar disorder, and history of malignant hypertension with hypertensive encephalopathy.
medical_history.family_history: Father with antiphospholipid syndrome, hypertension, diabetes mellitus; sister with multiple sclerosis; siblings with asthma and hypertension.
